title: A godly learned and fruitfull sermon Made vpon the fourteenth of Iohn in which is plainely set foorth the true looue of Christ, the markes whereby the children of God are knovven and the commodities vvhich that looue bringeth. By D. S. 1584.
author: D. S., fl. 1584.
publisher: Printed for Yarath Iames, and Thomas Lawe and, are to be solde in newgate market ouer against Christe Chvrch gate,
